title: Linux pstree Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the process hierarchy on your Linux system using the pstree command. Learn how to filter and customize the output to gain a deeper understanding of your system's processes.

meta.title: Linux pstree Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the process hierarchy on your Linux system using the pstree command. Learn how to filter and customize the output to gain a deeper understanding of your system's processes.
meta.keywords: Linux, pstree, process hierarchy, process monitoring, system management

verify.name: Verify the pstree command output
verify.hint: The pstree command should display the process hierarchy, with systemd as the parent process.

steps.title: Explore the Process Hierarchy with pstree

verify.name: Verify the pstree output for docker processes
verify.hint: The pstree command should display the process hierarchy for the docker service.

steps.title: Filter and Customize the pstree Output

verify.name: Verify the pstree output for the current process
verify.hint: The pstree command should display the current process (the shell process) in the output.
